pullrequest.title: [WIP] Run test against multiple physics plugins

content.raw:
You probably noticed this already, but the `SimulationFeatures_TEST.cc` is located in `dartsim/src/`, so it only gets built when the `dartsim` component is built \(i.e. when `libdartsim` is available at configuration time\).

We'll probably want to move it into `test/integration` so that it's not dependent on `dartsim`.
content.html:
You probably noticed this already, but the SimulationFeatures_TEST.cc is located in dartsim/src/, so it only gets built when the dartsim component is built (i.e. when libdartsim is available at configuration time).

We'll probably want to move it into test/integration so that it's not dependent on dartsim.
